rev.comment: I haven't seen it yet, but I can take a guess. The trailer implies guilty by saying he's jailed for it.
william baker=sandman's real name, but mentioned marko, trailer says ben's killer was sandman

rv - Editors can click on the link to find out who he was in the comics

rv - Wikipedia is not a dump for this kind of information.
those photos are no longer up on SHH, and there are no photos on IMDb, forums do not count as they tend to ignore the requests of companies
rv - We have two pictures for the Venom subsection. I think that's enough, and apparently, these leaked pictures have been getting pulled down, anyway.
/* Cast */ Gwen Stacy is trying to get in Parker's pants, not the police captain... whoops.
/* Cast */ Geez, Ace, I was in the middle of editing this section, too... I updated the fragments to full sentences, hope you don't mind me overriding your changes. You can mess with my new edit.
/* Cast */ Slight fixes to John Jameson and Curt Conners.
/* Cast */ Removing citation of Bryce Dallas Howard casting, as her role has been widely noted by various sources as opposed to other cast members with citations attached
/* Footage */ Sorted new reference about Spider-Man 3 trailer being online on Nov. 9th, re-inserted Casino Royale mention
/* Cast */ I'm liking how this is going. Now, if I may just...rewrite it a bit. Cleaned up: run on sentences, possibly inaccurate assertions (probably not the writer's fault), etc.
/* Visual effects */ Added information about Imageworks designing programs from ground-up to design visual effects, from already-existing citation
rv - irrelevant. link is to the game, link should reflect such to readers to avoid confusion
/* Video game */ I think we know it's a video game

/* Footage */ Cleaned up sentence and cited new information
/* Video game */ See also: into Main article:
/* Cast */ Updated Cast to more detailed format; not sure who Tim DeZarn a.k.a. Philip Watson is -- Mary Jane's father?
/* Posters */ didn't notice it was already linked, should have removed the link instead of sending it to the right place
Wikipedia is not a crystal ball or a forum for fandome rumors
Wikipedia is not a crystal ball or a forum for fandome rumors
/* Cameos */ Maitre d' reference removed since video on blog does not show role anymore; leave as ambiguous and see talk page about Mysterio discussion
/* Sandman */ Till the Sandman, he comes... with a family -- wifey and daughter, with citation goodness
rv - Take it to the talk page so we can discuss this
rv - The sentence you posted is speculation itself and not [[WP:V|verifiable]]

image was fine, and that would be a big "i don't think so" to the last
no actual facts have been confirmed for this, just rumormills
/* Venom */ First part is true. However, the mask bust and concept sketch were removed from the net per the request of Sony.
/* Venom */ Improper reference. 3D Venom created by Brazilian animator, not Sony.

rv, it is still a rumor

rv - Only the dude that's been mentioned in this article a few times and is the producer that keeps up writing the official movie blog. It's a righteous edit by a GIPU, son

rv - some dude's blog, quoting some other dude, is NOT a source.
As the Captain would say: cite these rumors!

rv - The article said, "Superhero Hype! has learned that we won't just be getting a new Spider-Man 3 trailer with Casino Royale on November 17th" -- notice the "just"
